docs.snippet: Liverpool’s potent attack overcame an early goal by Stoke. The Reds are now 6 points behind first-place Chelsea in the Premier League....
docs.lead_paragraph: Liverpool’s potent attack overcame an early goal by Stoke. The Reds are now 6 points behind first-place Chelsea in the Premier League.

headline.main: Liverpool Defeats Stoke and Edges Closer to Chelsea

docs.snippet: Russia's anti-doping agency RUSADA said on Wednesday it had not admitted to mass doping in the country's sports system and that a report in the New York Times which suggested it had was a distortion of its position....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia's anti-doping agency RUSADA said on Wednesday it had not admitted to mass doping in the country's sports system and that a report in the New York Times which suggested it had was a distortion of its position.

docs.snippet: The Kremlin said on Wednesday it would check the veracity of a report in the New York Times to make sure that Russia's top anti-doping official had been accurately quoted when talking about doping in the country's sports system....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Kremlin said on Wednesday it would check the veracity of a report in the New York Times to make sure that Russia's top anti-doping official had been accurately quoted when talking about doping in the country's sports system.

headline.main: Kremlin Says to Check Veracity of Russian Official's Doping Comments
headline.print_headline: Kremlin Says to Check Veracity of Russian Official's Doping Comments

docs.snippet: Russia will face any "necessary actions and sanctions" after investigators alleged that soccer players had suspicious drug-test samples covered up as part of a wider doping scandal in the 2018 World Cup host nation, FIFA President Gianni Infantino...
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia will face any "necessary actions and sanctions" after investigators alleged that soccer players had suspicious drug-test samples covered up as part of a wider doping scandal in the 2018 World Cup host nation, FIFA President Gianni Infantino said Wednesday.

headline.main: Infantino: 'Necessary Actions & Sanctions' on Russian Doping
headline.print_headline: Infantino: 'Necessary Actions & Sanctions' on Russian Doping

docs.lead_paragraph: EJ Manuel will start at quarterback for the Buffalo Bills on Sunday, but interim head coach Anthony Lynn made it clear the decision to bench Tyrod Taylor in the season finale came from the front office.

headline.main: Interim Bills Coach Says Benching QB Taylor Business Decision
headline.print_headline: Interim Bills Coach Says Benching QB Taylor Business Decision
